title: Kono Naka ni Hitori, Imouto ga Iru! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Harem   Romance   School Life   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Adopted Children   Amnesia   Incest   Loli   Male Protagonist   Siblings   Younger Sisters
author: Hajime Taguchi
description: Mikadono Shōgo, the son of an industrial magnate, has until the end of high school to find a girl he loves for marriage because of his late father's last will. For that, he transfers into Miryuuin Academy. Among the students there is a girl who says that she is Shōgo's separated-at-birth sister, but she does not inform him of her identity. She and some other girls then try to get close to him.>
